full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO 'KHOR BCAS SGRUB CING GTOR MA DBUL BA'I RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG ZAB MOS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING BRGYUD SDE DANG MI MTHUN PA'I LOG BCOS MANG POS MA SLAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING CHA TSANG BAR BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO @018A *, ,'KHOR BCAS SGRUB CING GTOR MA DBUL BA'I RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL MAN NGAG ZAB MOS RNAM PAR BRGYAN CING BRGYUD SDE DANG MI MTHUN PA'I LOG BCOS MANG POS MA SLAD PAR MDOR BSDUS SHING CHA TSANG BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI MANG DU THOS PA'I SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG POS GNOD SBYIN GANG BA BZANG PO'I GANG MGUL DBEN GNAS RIN CHEN 'BAR BA'I SDINGS SU BRIS PA'O, ,BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
